title: Hubble Helps Determine Uranus’ Rotation Rate with Unprecedented Precision
summary: An international team of astronomers using the NASA/ESA Hubble Space Telescope has made new measurements of Uranus’ interior rotation rate with a novel technique, achieving a level of accuracy 1,000 times greater than previous estimates.
